name: wool
author: Nicolas Lochet <nicolas.lochet@gmail.com>
description: Test some idea about event/log based datastorage, CQRS and fancy stuff.

scripts.start: if [ ! -f example/data/events.db ];then echo -n '' > example/data/events.db; fi && node cli.js example/rules/index.js -i example/data/init.json -e example/data/events.db | bunyan
scripts.watch: nodemon -V -w cli.js -w index.js -w app/server/ -w example/rules/ ./cli.js -- example/rules/index.js -d -i example/data/init.json -e example/data/events.db | bunyan
scripts.autolinttest: nodemon -e js,yml -x 'npm run lint && tape test/**/*.spec.js |tap-summary --no-progress'
scripts.link-all: for u in $(ls -1d node_modules/wool-* | xargs basename -a); do npm link $u; done
